title: John Sebastian Tan
text:
I‚Äôm a senior majoring in Statistics & Data Science and Economics at UCLA. I‚Äôm passionate about solving problems using data-driven insights and incentives to motivate change. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy solving problems with innovative yet simple solutions. I‚Äôm currently interested in product or project management roles, where I can empower diverse teams to build outcomes greater than the sum of their parts.
Outside of work, I love engaging with all forms of creative media üì∏. In my free time you will find me watching a movie, reading a book, diving into a great game, editing a video, drawing or learning a new software. I also enjoy quality time with my family, playing golf, and running. I‚Äôm currently training for a marathon!
I‚Äôm a proud Singaporean üá∏üá¨, and deeply grateful for the opportunities my family has given me. Their support has shaped my values and continues to motivate everything I pursue.
Welcome to my website, feel free to reach out!


University of California, Los Angeles ‚Äì Los Angeles, CA
B.S. Statistics & Data Science, B.A. Economics
Expected June 2026 - Summa Cum Laude
Clubs: USAC Community Service Commission, ACM Studio, Film Production Society



Project Liaison Advisor, USAC Community Service Commission ‚Äì Los Angeles, CA
June 2025 ‚Äì Present

Advise 6 Project Liaison Directors overseeing 30+ student-led service organizations, ensuring equitable access to key resources such as funding (over $200K USD) and transportation.
Develop long-term knowledge continuity tools, including tutorial videos, online dashboards, and documentation, to ensure sustainable onboarding and smoother transitions between annual leadership teams.

Financial Controller Intern, SIEMENS Advanta ‚Äì Prague, Czech Republic
June 2024 ‚Äì August 2024

Conducted five project-controlling case studies on topics such as purchase volume, IT cost analysis, and manpower planning, utilizing Excel and exploring AI tools to optimize processes.
Shadowed key financial controlling processes, including ordering, time booking, reporting, and cost and supplier analysis, gaining familiarity with SAP invoicing and corporate procedures.

Resident Assistant, UCLA Residential Life ‚Äì Los Angeles, CA
September 2023 ‚Äì June 2024

Selected out of over 2,000 UCLA applicants to be a Resident Assistant (RA), overseeing the wellbeing and safety of 73 student residents in UCLA housing and fostering community by organizing a wide variety of programs.
Completed a comprehensive 2-week training program to refine managerial skills and interpersonal counseling techniques for effective conflict resolution and leadership.

Naval Officer, Platoon Commander, Singapore Armed Forces ‚Äì Singapore
January 2020 ‚Äì November 2021

Spearheaded the coordination of daily operations and personnel within the Fast Craft Company in as Officer-Of-The-Day in the Fast Craft Training Unit (FCTU).
Guided and mentored groups of 10 to 20 new recruits at a time; facilitated their training schedules to ensure a safe and effective progression towards operational readiness.

title: ASA DataFest 2025 - Judges‚Äô Choice üèÖ
text: We were tasked to analyze a rich but messy data set provided by Savills Real Estate, to find potential actionable insights, overlooked trends, major oddities, or interesting quirks within real estate data set. And we were to do this all within 48 hours.

title: ASA DataFest 2025 - Judges‚Äô Choice üèÖ
text:
Final Slides
After several long hours of hard work, dead ends, sparks of ideas, and intense concentration, we were able to put together a slide deck that synthesized the main trends we saw occurring within key markets. The finished product is below:


Read more about the competition and the results in this article written by UCLA.
